import "./exportPdf.css" import logo from "../../../images/logo.JPG"; import car from "../../../images/car.png"; import jsPDF from "jspdf"; import domtoimage from 'dom-to-image'; import { Button } from "react-bootstrap"; export default function ExportPdf() { const generatePDF = () => { const input = document.getElementById('pddf'); const pdf = new jsPDF(); if (pdf) { domtoimage.toPng(input) .then(imgData => { pdf.addImage(imgData, 'PNG', 0, 0, 210, 280); pdf.save('download.pdf'); }); } /* var doc = new jsPDF("p" , "pt" , "a2"); doc.html(document.querySelector("#pddf") , { callback: function(pdf){ pdf.processArabic(pdf); pdf.save("contrat.pdf"); } }); */ }; return ( <>
